instructions_to_main_agent: Setup 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Space Grotesk' via Google Fonts in index.html.
Create a 'Layout' component that wraps the app with the background image and noise overlay.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (connection status, errors).
For the Chat UI: Messages must float. Use 'flex-col-reverse' for the chat container to handle scrolling naturally.
For Audio: Use simple CSS keyframes for the 'talking' animation on the avatar/visualizer.
STRICT: No white backgrounds. All surfaces must be dark gray/black with low opacity.
UUID Display: Show the user's UUID in the top left, truncated (e.g., 'usr_...A8F2') with a copy-to-clipboard function.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors: separates good from extraordinary.
Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
